page.title: 05MILLBROOK VILLAGE STUDY
page.content: Millbrook is situated between Stalybridge and Mossley.The B1675,Huddersfield Road,runs through the village and divides in into two very different areas.On the east side of the main road is a council estate built in the 1950's.There are about 185 houses,the majority of which are semi-detached and built out of brick.At the time of this survey some of the residents had bought their houses-we counted twenty four.On the west side of the road the houses are much older,built during the last century when the{mills}were working cotton.There are about 150 of these privately owned properties.Those situated behind Huddersfield Road still stand on the original cobbled streets.The shops are on the main road and with the exception of the Post Office are all on the east side.
